meta.title: AVA Arts District | AvalonBay Communities

div.div: Download our Retail Brochure to learn about retail space leasing opportunities at this unique location.

div.h2: Whatever you want, the possibilities are endless at AVA.
div.span: AVA is a brand-new living space in Downtown Los Angeles’ most exciting and vibrant neighborhood, the Arts District. The reasons to love Arts District are endless. Which is why we chose to be in the heart of it all. AVA Arts District features studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom, and three-bedroom apartments for lease with dens in select homes. Our open concept floor plans feature kitchens with stainless steel appliances, quartz-stone countertops, and tile backsplash. We offer unique home features including sliding barn doors, open-concept customizable closets, and gear walls for storing all your things, your way. Plus, our technology package, AVAConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, smart access entry, smart thermostats, and digital resident services including online rent payment and service requests, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Our pet-friendly community features a fully-loaded fitness center, courtyard pool, multiple lounge areas, co-working spaces, and rooftop terrace. Best of all, we’re located in the Arts District with tons of entertaining and dining options, making our home base your perfect home base.

img.alt: Chill terrace with globe string lights.
Portrait of tattooed young man with sun glasses.

a.div: You already love this neighborhood. So, what are you waiting for? Get out there. Breathe it in. We’re giving you access to it all with plenty of space to get away from it all for when you need to recharge.

img.alt: Retro styled bicycle parked on city sidewalk.

a.div: When we say we’ll hook you up, we mean it. Phone charging stations and common areas with Wi-Fi help keep you connected. Oh, and then there’s the fitness center, parking and bike storage so you can stay on the move hassle-free. Told you.

img.alt: Three stylish young women posing together against an urban background.

a.div: Whether it’s an evening spent binge-watching the latest true crime docuseries or a lively game night in the lounge, you like to play host, and hey, a little apartment-envy from your friends never hurt.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

img.alt: Rendering of the maker spaces alley

div.div: Arts District is a neighborhood reborn from industrial roots that has evolved into a vibrant, eclectic scene of entertainment, creativity, and innovation. In addition to 475 apartment homes, AVA Arts District brings 55,000 square feet of arts, retail and restaurant space to the area.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Your pet is part of the fam, and that’s why we take pet-friendly living to the next level. Plus, who could say “no” to that face?

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Affordable homes for rent available through the affordable housing program for qualifying future residents.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

","description":"AVA is a brand-new living space in Downtown Los Angeles’ most exciting and vibrant neighborhood, the Arts District. The reasons to love Arts District are endless. Which is why we chose to be in the heart of it all. AVA Arts District features studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom, and three-bedroom apartments for lease with dens in select homes. Our open concept floor plans feature kitchens with stainless steel appliances, quartz-stone countertops, and tile backsplash. We offer unique home features including sliding barn doors, open-concept customizable closets, and gear walls for storing all your things, your way. Plus, our technology package, AVAConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, smart access entry, smart thermostats, and digital resident services including online rent payment and service requests, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Our pet-friendly community features a fully-loaded fitness center, courtyard pool, multiple lounge areas, co-working spaces, and rooftop terrace. Best of all, we’re located in the Arts District with tons of entertaining and dining options, making our home base your perfect home base.","previewWordCount":500},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","id":"f0fXRSyPXSFu5yf","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"imgSrc":"https://cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/avalonbay/OOZS7JFGSFCF3MDFDSQ3VMWQUQ.jpg","imgAlt":"Chill terrace with globe string lights.","furnishedDescription":"Furnished+ offers all the essential items you need to move in plus conveniences like flexible lease terms, included utilities, and immediate access to highspeed Wi-Fi and cable TV."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","props":{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","id":"c0fHYR94YSFu5B5","customFields":{"title":"Authentic.
